trends: There have been 54 other sightings in Vancouver
There were no other sightings in Vancouver on or around May 23rd 2008
Summary: Black Chevron that was silent, moving slowly, no lights, and turning in a controlled manner
divs: sighting detailsi was staying up late watching tv when i heard birds outside my apartment complex making a lot of noise. i only hear this and awake to this type of activity during the morning since i live on a second story of an apartment complex and the tops of the trees meet my window. yes, it's bothersome, but also it alerts me if something is going on when the birds get quiet or start making a noise in the middle of the night. needless to say, i don't need a guard dog. once i hear the birds, i got up, thinking that squirrels were into a nest or something along the lines of them intruding. i feed squirrels, so i thought i would step outside thinking that they might need a midnight snack. looking around, i did not see anything thing of the sort, so i went down to check the cars and surrounding area, as well as get some fresh air. i noticed nothing going on and decided to gaze around up at the sky. once i did, i saw a huge, approximately 200-300 yrd black chevron shaped or you can call it a boomerang shaped object in the sky. it was totally silent and traveling, my best guess, and about 60 miles per hour. i knew i was going to see this again. i saw something similar in the mid 80's when i was in grade school and well as in 2001 when i was back visiting family from the navy. the 80's sighting along with the 2001 sighting was all around the general vicinity that i am reporting now. the past two sightings i decided not to report, but have been searching continuously to see if anyone else has. i have not been able to come up with it. i believe though i have not made enough effort, only checking the internet which surprisingly does not yield to much information. my next step is to go to the library to see if any reports via newspaper microfische will conjure up something. back to the story, i decided, not to run and get my camera, but to gather as much information visual that i could and to take in the moment and try to embed as much in my brain as possible. the chevron object was silent. it was traveling about 60 mph, my guess is based up relationship to a private propped airplane, like a cessna. it was moving and then stopped, hovered for about 15 seconds, rotated about 45 degress \ or changed direction, and then started moving again at the same speed. it had no lights and was totally black. the only reason that i know its shape was that it was against clouds that were back-lit by the local city lights. i looked in the saturday papers to see if anything was reported but did not see anything. this is my 3rd sighting of this exact same ufo, and not heard of any other reports. i need some help if anyone else out there has seen this or experienced something similar. i feel like i am going to see this again and i do not know why. eventually, it headed north of the columbia river which i am next to and went out of sight
